{"id":1012984254,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 months, 1 week","timestamp":1691247226,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1012984254/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Seconds to Equalize a Circular Array","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int minimumSeconds(vector<int>& nums) {\n        int mxm=0;\n        map<int,int>mp;\n        for(int i=0;i<nums.size();i++){\n            mp[nums[i]]++;\n        }\n        if(mp.size()==1)return 0;\n        for(auto x:mp){\n            if(x.second>mxm)mxm=x.second;\n        }\n        int c=0;\n        for(auto x:mp){\n            if(x.second==mxm){c=x.first;}\n        }\n        \n        int cnt=0;\n        int ans=0;\n        int n=nums.size();\n        while(true){\n            if(cnt<mxm){\n            for(int i=0;i<n;i++){\n                if(nums[i]==c){\n                    cnt++;\n                    nums[(i - 1 + n) % n]=nums[i];\n                    nums[(i + 1 + n) % n]=nums[i];\n                    i++;\n                }\n            }}else break;\n            ans++;\n            \n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-seconds-to-equalize-a-circular-array","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
